Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Deep cup with a slightly flattened base and a simple lip, bearing a red slip on the outside surface and a pale brown-red one on the inside, both of which have been carefully polished. A geometrical design of four panels of concentric chevrons arranged in a radiating pattern was applied on the inside.
